v1.title: Introducing Justia ChatExclusive to Justia Connect Pro Members in the Justia Lawyer Directory!

config: Starting July 30th, your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile will feature our latest Justia Connect Pro benefit—Justia Chat!

Justia Chat is a new and exclusive benefit for Justia Connect Pro members like yourself. It is an AI-powered lead generation tool designed to streamline interactions with potential clients on your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile. Powered by AI, this virtual assistant engages visitors and gathers pertinent information, transforming it into actionable leads for you.
What This New Benefit Means for You?
Having Justia Chat* on your Jusita Lawyer Directory Profile can boost your chances of getting even more potential clients from your enhanced profile.
How Do I Unlock This New Perk?
Sit back and relax! This benefit will automatically be added to your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile on July 30—no action required.
However, if you wish to disable the Justia Chat feature, the instructions are below:

description: Log into your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile: https://www.justia.com/lawyers
Click on the “Edit Chat Settings” below “Your Dashboard”.

config: Let us know if you have any questions.
